products.name: PlayStation 2 USB Modded Console
products.description: The PlayStation® 2 generation included giant steps forward in home console gaming, with augmented reality, online multiplayer gaming, and more ambitious, large-scale games on DVD discs. Offering users cutting-edge gaming, DVD playback, online functionality, and backward compatibility with original PlayStation discs, the PS2 console represented an irresistible package at launch and throughout its lifespan.

products.name: PlayStation 3 Slim 500gb ( Refurbuished )
products.description: The PlayStation® 3 era built on the legacy of previous generations with incredible leaps forward in online gaming and digital services, while the arrival of Blu-ray Disc games allowed creators to expand their ambitions and build truly immersive game worlds on a grand scale. The PS3 console delivered cutting-edge graphics, a robust online ecosystem, and multimedia capabilities that transformed the living room experience. As well as introducing gamers to incredible single-player adventures and revolutionary online experiences, PS3™ became an entertainment mainstay in owners’ homes thanks to new music and movie streaming apps, and easily accessible digital games via the new PlayStation™ Store.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Pro
products.description: Premium 4K gaming console with enhanced performance and graphics. Perfect for HDR gaming. The PlayStation 4 Pro brings true 4K gaming and enhanced performance to your living room. With 8-core CPU and 4.2 TFLOP GPU, enjoy smooth gameplay and stunning visuals. The 1TB SSD provides ample storage for your game library, and support for PlayStation VR opens new gaming dimensions.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The world's most powerful console. Play next-gen games with 4K resolution at 120fps. Xbox Series X is the world's most powerful gaming console, featuring a custom 8-core CPU and 12 TFLOP GPU. Experience 4K gaming at 120fps with ray tracing support. The innovative velocity architecture and 1TB SSD ensure virtually no load times. With Game Pass, get instant access to hundreds of games including day-one releases.

products.name: Xbox Series S
products.description: Next-gen performance at a great price. Play 1440p gaming with excellent performance. Xbox Series S delivers next-gen gaming in a compact form factor at an affordable price. With 8-core CPU and 4 TFLOP GPU, enjoy smooth 1440p gaming and up to 120fps. The 512GB SSD is perfect for your favorite Game Pass titles, and Smart Delivery ensures you're always playing the optimized version of your games.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED
products.description: Hybrid gaming console with stunning 7-inch OLED screen. Play anywhere, anytime. The Nintendo Switch OLED model features a gorgeous 7-inch OLED display with vibrant colors and perfect blacks. Enjoy the same hybrid gaming experience with portability and performance. Play docked, in tabletop mode, or handheld - the choice is yours. Includes improved audio and enhanced storage.

products.name: Nintendo Switch Lite
products.description: Portable-only console for on-the-go gaming. Lightweight and durable design. The Nintendo Switch Lite is the perfect portable gaming device. Featuring a compact 5.5-inch LCD screen and lightweight design, take your gaming anywhere. Play your favorite Switch games in handheld mode, with great battery life and durability. It's the affordable entry point to the Nintendo Switch ecosystem.

products.name: PS4 Slim 500GB
products.description: Compact PS4 with excellent game library. Great for budget-conscious gamers. The PlayStation 4 Slim is a smaller, lighter version of the original PS4 with all the same great gaming. With 500GB storage and a massive library of exclusive games, it's an excellent choice for budget-conscious gamers. Enjoy stunning graphics, exclusive titles, and online multiplayer gaming.

products.name: DualSense Wireless Controller
products.description: Next-gen controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for immersive gaming. The DualSense controller revolutionizes gaming with cutting-edge haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Feel every impact, vibration, and sensation in incredible detail. The built-in microphone, speaker, and touchpad offer new ways to interact with games. Experience gaming like never before.

products.name: DualShock 4 Controller
products.description: Standard PS4 controller with reliable performance and comfortable grip design. The DualShock 4 is the official PlayStation 4 controller, featuring dual vibration motors, a sensitive touchpad, and convenient share button. The ergonomic design fits comfortably in your hands for extended play sessions. Compatible with PS4 and supports a wide range of games.

products.name: Xbox Wireless Controller
products.description: Precise and responsive controller with 40-hour battery life. Perfect for Xbox and PC. The Xbox Wireless Controller features premium build quality and responsive controls. With up to 40 hours of battery life, you'll have weeks of gaming before needing to recharge. Works seamlessly with Xbox consoles and Windows PC, making it the versatile choice for gamers.

products.name: HDMI 2.1 Cable Premium
products.description: High-speed HDMI cable supporting 4K@120Hz. Certified and durable construction. This premium HDMI 2.1 cable supports the latest 4K gaming at 120fps. With certified construction and superior shielding, you'll get pristine video and audio quality. Perfect for connecting your gaming console to modern displays with minimal latency.

products.name: PlayStation 2 8MB Memory Card
products.description: This memory card is exclusively for PS-2 and gives real 8MB memory on a single card. Used for archiving the game process, to save the game progress 100% compatible with the memory card. This card is compatible for all version of the Sony PS2. Can works with both the standard PS2 and PS2 Slim version., this is the generic third party manufacture card not original Sony Manufacture Easy to use, just plug in and play. Packing Includes: 1 x Memory Card

Used for archiving the game process, to save the game progress 100% compatible with the memory card.
This card is compatible for all version of the Sony PS2. Can works with both the standard PS2 and PS2 Slim version.
Easy to use, just plug in and play.

products.name: PlayStation 2 AV Cable
products.description: PlayStation AV Cable is made with high quality materials to ensure durability and video quality are met. This AV cable is compatible with multiple PlayStation models, including PS1, PS2, PS2 Slim, PS3, and PS3 Slim. Simply plug this AV cable into your PlayStation and then into your TV’s corresponding inputs. Outputs at standard resolution. Ultra thick and flexible jacket with color coded connectors to simplify installation. NOTE: This is not a HDMI Cable. If you are using this for PS3 for the first time, you need to reset the PS3 video settings. You can Google - How to reset PS3 Video Settings.
specs: Play Station AV CABLE PS AV Cable is made with high quality materials to ensure durability and video quality are met.
[WORKS FOR MULTIPLE PLAY STATION MODELS PS1, PS2, AND PS3] This AV cable is compatible with multiple PlayStation models, including PS1, PS2, PS2 slim, PS3, and PS3 slim
[EASY TO USE] Simply plug this AV cable into your Play Station and then into your TV’s corresponding inputs. Outputs at standard resolution.
Ultra thick and flexible jacket with color coded connectors to simplify installation.

products.name: PlayStation AV2HDMI Converter
products.description: PS2 to HDMI video converter with 3.5mm audio output for HDTV HDMI monitor supports all PS2 display modes. A converter for the PS2 console, outputs video and audio in fully digital HDMI format and supports PS2 display modes (480i.576i, 480p). With just one HDMI cable, connect and play for realistic video / audio effects on your TV / monitor. 1).Connect your HDMI cable from your TV to the PS2-to-HDMI converter unit. Connect the PS2-to-HDMI converter unit to the PS2 output. Connect the supplied USB cable from the PS2-to-HDMI converter unit to the PS2 or a USB wall adapter. The USB cable and connection provide 5V power to the unit. 2).The PS2 must setup for Component Video Output (Y Pb Pr) as opposed to RGB output. If you can't see anything on your TV when using this, you probably need to go into the Configuration Settings (load PS2 without a disc) and scroll through the options to change this. 3).Once everything is connected and powered on, switch your TV to the correct HDMI input. You should see the PS2 home screen. If you don't see anything, double-check all connections and make sure the PS2 is set to Component Video Output (Y Pb Pr).
specs: Support all PS2 display modes (NTSC 480i 480p, PAL 576i).
Synchronization of video and audio output in full digital HDMI format, without transmission loss.
The moving images in video games are broadcast in real time, without any delay.
Analog audio output allows you to plug in headphones to not disturb others when playing late at night.

products.name: 144Hz Gaming Monitor 27 Inch
products.description: High refresh rate gaming monitor with IPS panel for smooth competitive gaming. Gain the competitive edge with this 144Hz gaming monitor. The IPS panel delivers vivid colors and wide viewing angles, while the 1ms response time ensures razor-sharp responsiveness. Perfect for competitive shooters, MOBAs, and fast-paced games. Includes adjustable stand and AMD FreeSync support.

products.name: 4K Gaming TV 55 Inch HDR
products.description: Premium 4K TV with HDMI 2.1 and 120Hz support for next-gen console gaming. Transform your gaming room with this stunning 4K TV featuring HDMI 2.1 connectivity and 120Hz refresh rate. Enjoy next-gen console gaming at its finest with 4K resolution, HDR support, and minimal input lag. The quantum dot technology delivers exceptional color accuracy and brightness.

products.name: PlayStation 2 USB Modded 250GB/320GB
products.description: Enhanced PlayStation 2 console with USB mod and massive storage. Play hundreds of PS2 classics with this upgraded console featuring USB modding and 250GB or 320GB storage capacity. Enjoy backward compatibility with PS1 games and DVD playback. Perfect for retro gaming enthusiasts who want an extensive game library at their fingertips.

products.name: PlayStation 3 Super Slim 500GB (Refurbished)
products.description: The most compact PlayStation 3 model with enhanced efficiency and quieter operation. This Super Slim model features a sliding disc cover design and reduced power consumption. Enjoy Blu-ray gaming, streaming services, and access to PlayStation Network. Perfect for both gaming and multimedia entertainment in your living room.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Fat 1TB (Refurbished)
products.description: Original PlayStation 4 model with massive 1TB storage capacity. The iconic first-generation PS4 console delivers stunning HD gaming and exclusive PlayStation titles. With 1TB storage, you'll have plenty of space for your favorite games. Experience the PlayStation ecosystem with access to PlayStation Plus, PlayStation VR compatibility, and shareplay features.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Slim 1TB (Refurbished)
products.description: Sleek and compact PS4 Slim with 1TB storage for extensive game library. The PS4 Slim delivers the same powerful gaming performance in a smaller, more energy-efficient design. With 1TB storage, install all your favorite AAA titles and indie games. Enjoy exclusive PlayStation games, HDR support, and seamless online multiplayer gaming.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Pro 1TB (Refurbished)
products.description: Premium PS4 Pro with 4K gaming capabilities and enhanced performance. Experience gaming at its finest with PS4 Pro's 4K resolution and HDR support. The upgraded GPU delivers smoother frame rates and enhanced graphics. With 1TB storage and PlayStation VR compatibility, this is the ultimate PlayStation 4 experience for serious gamers.

products.name: Xbox 360 RGH 500GB (Refurbished)
products.description: Modified Xbox 360 with RGH (Reset Glitch Hack) and 500GB storage. This custom-modified Xbox 360 features RGH modification allowing homebrew applications and extensive customization. With 500GB storage, enjoy a massive library of Xbox 360 classics. Perfect for retro gaming enthusiasts who want the ultimate Xbox 360 experience.

products.name: PlayStation 4 DualShock 4 Controller
products.description: Original-style PlayStation 4 DualShock 4 wireless controller designed for accurate gameplay, responsive button feedback, and comfortable long-hour gaming. Ideal as a replacement or spare controller with full feature support including touchpad, motion sensors, vibration, and precise analog sticks.

products.description: Heavy-duty cooling fan replacement for PlayStation 4 Pro systems. Designed to handle higher thermal output, ensuring efficient heat dissipation and stable performance during intensive gaming sessions.

products.description: High-efficiency power supply replacement for PlayStation 4 Slim models. Built for consistent and safe power delivery to fix no power, random shutdown, or unstable console issues.
